__e: O Zeus and Earth and gods that guard the city... my father's curse, mighty evil spirit!
One-on-one with the son 'a Zeus... and I'm out here.
Hi, I'm Zeus, and believe me, the pleasure is all mine.
For the love of Zeus, don't you see what's going on?
But the son of Zeus cannot hide from his destiny forever.
Zeus doesn't care about me, so why should I spend my time thinking about him?
He was a man like no other, born of a beautiful mortal woman but fathered by Zeus, king of the gods.
She passed. I lived. Some say that makes Zeus my dad.
He was a man like no other, born of a beautiful mortal woman but fathered by Zeus, king of the gods.
That means that Zeus, himself, is on our side!
But in you, the son of Zeus, lies the light of the world.
Are you saying that Zeus is trying to drive you mad to help you see more clearly?
